member.name: T:Microsoft.International.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleRuby
member.summary: Provides a Label Server Control, which displays content in Ruby format.

member.summary: Renders the content with Ruby format.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleRuby.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text content of the control.
member.returns: The text content of the control. The default value is .

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleRuby.RubyCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of the CSS class that applys to the Ruby mark.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleRuby.RubyTextCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of the CSS class that only applys to annotation text.

member.summary: Gets or sets the left fallback parenthesis.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleRuby.FallbackRightParenthesis
member.summary: Gets or sets the right fallback parenthesis.

member.name: T:Microsoft.International.Web.UI.WebControls.CommonResource
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.Web.UI.WebControls.CommonResource.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.Web.UI.WebControls.CommonResource.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
